alertRules.name: M365 Audit Collection Failure
alertRules.description: Triggers when M365 audit log collection fails for more than 2 consecutive runs
alertRules.query: M365AuditCollectionSummary_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(15m) | where Success_b == false | count

alertRules.name: M365 Audit Collection Duration Alert
alertRules.description: Triggers when audit log collection takes longer than 10 minutes
alertRules.query: M365AuditCollectionSummary_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(10m) | where DurationSeconds_d > 600

alertRules.name: M365 Audit Low Data Volume
alertRules.description: Triggers when audit log collection returns significantly fewer records than expected
alertRules.query: M365AuditCollectionSummary_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | summarize AvgRecords = avg(TotalRecords_d) | where AvgRecords < 100

alertRules.name: M365 Audit High Error Rate
alertRules.description: Triggers when error rate exceeds 10% in the last hour
alertRules.query: M365AuditCollectionSummary_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | summarize ErrorRate = avg(ErrorCount_d) / avg(TotalRecords_d) * 100 | where ErrorRate > 10

alertRules.name: M365 Audit No Data Received
alertRules.description: Triggers when no audit data is received for 30 minutes
alertRules.query: search "M365*_CL" | where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) | where Type !contains "Summary" and Type !contains "Error" | count

alertRules.name: M365 Failed Login Attempts
alertRules.description: Triggers when a user has more than 10 failed login attempts in 15 minutes
alertRules.query: M365AzureADAudit_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(15m) | where Operation_s =~ "UserLoginFailed" | summarize FailedAttempts = count() by UserId_s | where FailedAttempts > 10

alertRules.name: M365 DLP Policy Violations
alertRules.description: Triggers when DLP policy violations exceed 20 in the last hour

alertRules.name: M365 Bulk File Operations
alertRules.description: Triggers when a user performs more than 50 file operations in 5 minutes
alertRules.query: M365SharePointAudit_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m) | where Operation_s in ("FileDownloaded", "FileCopied", "FileDeleted") | summarize OperationCount = count() by UserId_s | where OperationCount > 50

alertRules.name: M365 External File Sharing
alertRules.description: Triggers when external file sharing events exceed 10 in an hour
alertRules.query: M365SharePointAudit_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | where Operation_s contains "Share" and (Operation_s contains "External" or Operation_s contains "Anonymous") | count

alertRules.name: M365 Admin Activity Spike
alertRules.description: Triggers when administrative activities exceed normal baseline by 300%
alertRules.query: union M365*_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | where Operation_s contains "Admin" or Operation_s contains "Set" or Operation_s contains "Delete" | count

actionGroups.name: M365-Audit-Critical
